title: Professional Competency Enhancement Program Using a Systematic Training Model

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational theoretical knowledge and practical experience related to job duties
context.additional_context: Strengthening customized education design and implementation competencies for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, based on systematic training models.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core components of a systematic training model (analysis-design-development-implementation-evaluation) to practical settings.
Learners can design personalized education programs based on learners' needs analysis.
Learners can design and operate formative assessments for small groups in online environments.

resources: Online collaboration tools (Miro, Google Docs, etc.)
Real-world job scenario templates for case analysis
Digital worksheet templates for learning activities

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
